title: Cebuano - John (Book)
description: Cebuano translation of the Gospel of John. Cebuano, also referred to by most of its speakers simply and generically as Binisaya, is an Austronesian language, spoken in the southern Philippines.

language.name: Cebuano
language.area: Negros, Cebu, Bohol, Visayas and parts of Mindanao. Also in United States.
